titleStmt.title: The Welchmens prave [sic] resolution in defence of her king, her Pritish [sic] Parliament, and her country against te [sic] malignant party / subscribed by Shon, ap William, ap Richard, ap Thomas, ap Meredith, ap Evans, ap Loyd, ap Price, ap Hugh, ap Rowland, ap Powel, ap Shinkin, ap Shones.
titleStmt.author: Shones, Shon ap.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
